äº”

é¢˜ç›®æ¥æºï¼šhdu2643

Problem Description
Recently in Teddyâ€™s hometown there is a competition named â€œCow Year Blow Cowâ€.N competitors had took part in this competition.The competition was so intense that the rank was changing and changing.
Now the question is:
How many different ways that n competitors can rank in a competition, allowing for the possibility of ties.
Here are the ways when n = 2:
P1 < P2
P2 < P1
P1 = P2
